Module com.example.coursework_fix
Package com.example.coursework_fix

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
com.example.coursework_fix.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Controller extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is mainly used to switch between the scenes in the game
